name: Jonathan Irons
info:
• 别名: Jon
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1996年
  • 身高: 5' 10" (1.78 m)
  • 引用来源: http://callofduty.wikia.com/wiki/Jonathan_Irons
detail: Jonathan "Jon" Irons is the founder and president of the private military corporation, Atlas Corporation, in Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare. He starts off as a supporting character for the player, but is then revealed to be the main antagonist throughout the rest of the campaign.
